Mister_Devil plz look around a bit: you can download the crack here: http://gbw.naxphost.com/files/FIFA08v1.0NoDVDFixedexeEng.rar
Just unzip the file and replace the new exe file (FIFA08.exe) with the exe in your fifa 08 folder. (Standard: C:\Program Files\EA Sports\FIFA 08) hope it works now :)
